title: Signal out of range
body:
Ok so basically i have this really common problem, the black screen with signal out of range shit. Ive had this one before for a few games and fixed it by going to the folders out of game and changing the resolution in the note pad. I just started having this problem after an update today, so i thought it would be that the resolution had changed. i opened the game file in notepad and checked that the res was the same (i use 900 h 1440 w) but i changed it to a lower one either way. it didnt fix it. I have no clue what to do.
Please help me.

replies.body: This is an ongoing issue that's currently up on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I don't have a full resolution to offer just yet, but a current workaround may be to press Alt+Enter while in-game.  Let me know if that works for you!
Not working for me.. I don't have anything in Game.cfg file..
Same problem dude, patch didn't want to patch, and then i did clean reinstall and now i have this problem help please :(
